name: Arctic Assault (17+): Sniper vs Sniper
description:
** HEADSHOTS, BLOOD, AND GORE! **
** ACTION PACKED SNIPER GAME! **

In this ACTION packed shooting game, you're a sniper up against a team of snipers holding people hostage. Will you be able to save them and make it out alive?

- Multiple weapons!
- Multiple backgrounds/environments.
- Simple "one tap" controls!
- Instense soundtrack.

WARNING! - YOU MUST BE 17+ TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP DUE TO EXCESSIVE VIOLENCE.
